import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Footer from '../../Footer' import Navbar from '../../Navbar' const Cart = () => { const cart_items = useSelector(state=> state.cart.cart_items ) return ( <>

Cart Items

{ cart_items && cart_items.map((item)=> { return }) }
S.No. Prodct Image Product Name Unit Price Quantity Total Price Action
) } export default Cart
